steps: function (){if(!('MozActivity' in window)){return 'can\'t test, window.MozActivity missing';}var l=document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="javascript:"]'); if(l.length==0) return 'delay-and-retry'; for(var i=0;i<l.length;i++){if(l[i].getAttribute('target') == '_blank')return false; } return true;}
title: elpais.com mobile site opens blank tab on video start
